    • CheckRobotAngle

      public double CheckRobotAngle(double x, double y, double rad, double ang, int notID)
      Check angle of Robot ... if hitting wall, rebound; if hitting Robot, change angle
      Parameters:
      x - Robot x position
      y - y
      rad - radius
      ang - current angle
      notID - identify of Robot not to be checked
      Returns:
      new angle
